Row.Text: Cycles of Power

[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Cycles of Power[ENDCOLOR] is a new gameplay mechanic. Each civilization now starts with a choice of one of three Cycle Powers: Autocracy, Oligarchy, or Democracy, with each affecting the rate of your global Gold, Science, and Culture outputs.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]With your chosen Cycle Power, you will have a unique way of generating the new yield Virtue, which decays each turn. If your Virtue reaches 0, you will descend into Anarchy, after which your Cycle Power is replaced with a new one.
[COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Anarchy![ENDCOLOR]

[COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]During Anarchy, you will not gain any [ICON_RESEARCH] Science, [ICON_GOLD] Gold, [ICON_CULTURE] Culture, or [ICON_PEACE] Faith, and cities have no [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production to build anything.[ENDCOLOR]
Rule of none. None hold ultimate authority.

"Hereby it is manifest that during the time men live without a common Power to hold them in awe, they are in that condition which is called War; and such a war is of every man against every man." - Thomas Hobbes[NEWLINE][TAB]
